title: Ticket #5525: Improve performance of security policy ad creation
description:
When profiling for #5509, by setting up a view collector and a "baby" collector to feed it, we noticed that 20% of the time was spent in SecMan::FillInSecurityPolicyAd. This is a function which creates a classad based on the current condor configuration, and issues > 400 param calls (!). For unauthenticated connections (i.e. with host based security), we call this for every command on a socket.

Caching the creation of this classad results in a measureable performance improvement. With a quick check, condor_advertise'ing 10,000 ads went from 10.7 seconds to 9.6 seconds of real time, at 10% improvement.
